Mass NOW

Freelance

Project Summary

Mass NOW is the Massachusetts chapter of the National Organization for Women. They are “the only multi-issue, multi-strategy feminist organization in the Commonwealth.”

Role

Reorganized the site IA; redesigned the pages; cleaned up the visual style; and built a new WordPress theme.
